description: A representation of a set of cybersecurity elements from the NIST Cybersecurity and Privacy Reference Tool (CPRT).

doc_identifier.description: the short name of the document. This property will be used later.

version.description: the string representation of the version of the document

website.description: The URL of the document on the internet

doc_identifier.description: the short name of the related document

element_type.description: The type of element as given by the related document.

element_identifier.description: the name of the element. This property might be the identifier that is given to the element by the given document like 'ID.AM-1' or 'S0009'. Default value is the string 'N/A'.

title.description: The title of the element. Some elements may not have titles e.g. ID.AM-1 or S0009. Default value is the string 'N/A'.

text.description: This field represents the text within an element.

relationship_identifier.description: The name of the relationship type.

description.description: The description of the relationship type.

source_element_identifier.description: the business key of the element name which is the source element of the relationship

source_doc_identifier.description: the business key of the document short name which contains the source element

dest_element_identifier.description: the business key of the element name which is the destination element of the relationship

dest_doc_identifier.description: the business key of the document short name which contains the destination element

provenance_doc_identifier.description: the identifier of the provenance document which defined the relationship

relationship_identifier.description: the identifier of the relationship type id which is represented in the relationship
